column5: Can anyone tell me if there are camps that cater to large youth groups. Camps that can provide food, boats, and decent fishing to large groups? Thanks, Amlber
Try www.deertrail.on.ca They cater to families and large groups. From there you can get their contact information. Brown1
For a large youth group look at www.fishblackbear.com. You won't be able to beat the price and it's designed for large youth groups. JohnL.
